item.title: Cracker Barrel returning to handmade biscuits, latest in series of changes after customers speak out
item.description: Cracker Barrel eliminated DEI programs and suspended plans for restaurant remodels following customer backlash over a logo change.

item.title: Royal Caribbean passenger accused of jumping overboard to dodge vacation gambling debt
item.description: Jey Gonzalez-Diaz was caught with $14,600 cash after jumping from a cruise ship to allegedly evade gambling debts, faces federal charge and fines.

item.title: North Carolina residents fight back against massive tech project potentially coming to their town
item.description: Energy Storage Solutions LLC proposes a $6.4 billion data center in Tarboro, North Carolina, promising economic benefits amid community opposition.

item.title: US job growth through March revised lower by 911K
